actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: Congratulating the Small Business Development Centers of the Small Business Administration on their commitment to service America's small business owners and entrepreneurs.

summary.text: Congratulates the Small Business Development Centers of the Small Business Administration (SBA) on their service to America's small business owners and entrepreneurs. Recognizes the service of such Centers in helping small businesses start, grow, and flourish.

titles.title: Congratulating the Small Business Development Centers of the Small Business Administration on their commitment to service America's small business owners and entrepreneurs.
